verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> this <S%H1697>word<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> against <S%H1121>you<s%>, O sons of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, against the whole <S%H4940>family<s%> which I brought <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
You only have I <S%H3045>known<s%> of all the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>: therefore I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> you for all your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>.

Will a <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H7580>roar<s%> in the <S%H3293>forest<s%>, when he has no <S%H2964>prey<s%>? will a young <S%H3715>lion<s%> cry <S%H5414>out<s%> of his <S%H4585>den<s%>, if he have <S%H3920>taken<s%> <S%H1115>nothing<s%>?

Can a <S%H6833>bird<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> in a <S%H6341>snare<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>, where no <S%H4170>trap<s%> is for <S%H5927>him<s%>? shall one take up a <S%H6341>snare<s%> from the <S%H127>earth<s%>, and have <S%H3920>taken<s%> nothing at <S%H3920>all<s%>?

Shall a <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> be <S%H8628>blown<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> not be <S%H2729>afraid<s%>? shall there be <S%H7451>evil<s%> in a <S%H5892>city<s%>, and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has not done <S%H6213>it<s%>?
Surely the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H1697>nothing<s%>, but he <S%H1540>reveals<s%> his <S%H5475>secret<s%> unto his <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>.
The <S%H738>lion<s%> has <S%H7580>roared<s%>, who will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%>? the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%>, who can but <S%H5012>prophesy<s%>?

<S%H8085>Publish<s%> in the <S%H759>palaces<s%> at <S%H795>Ashdod<s%>, and in the <S%H759>palaces<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H622>Assemble<s%> yourselves upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4103>tumults<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> <S%H6217>there<s%>, and the oppressed in the midst <S%H8432>there<s%>.

For they <S%H3045>know<s%> not to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5229>right<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, who <S%H686>store<s%> up <S%H2555>violence<s%> and <S%H7701>robbery<s%> in their <S%H759>palaces<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; An <S%H6862>adversary<s%> there shall be even round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>; and he shall bring <S%H3381>down<s%> your <S%H5797>strength<s%> from <S%H759>you<s%>, and your palaces shall be <S%H962>spoiled<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; As the <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> takes <S%H5337>out<s%> of the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3767>legs<s%>, or a <S%H915>piece<s%> of a <S%H241>ear<s%>; so shall the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be taken <S%H5337>out<s%> that <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> in the <S%H6285>corner<s%> of a <S%H4296>bed<s%>, and in <S%H1833>Damascus<s%> in a <S%H6210>couch<s%>.
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H5749>you<s%>, and testify in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>,

That in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I shall <S%H6485>visit<s%> the <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> upon him I will also <S%H6485>visit<s%> the <S%H4196>altars<s%> of <S%H1008>Beth<s%>â€“el: and the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be cut <S%H1438>off<s%>, and <S%H5307>fall<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>.

And I will <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H2779>winter<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> with the <S%H7019>summer<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>; and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H8127>ivory<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%>, and the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> shall have a <S%H5486>end<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
